edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.ui

Interface PersonalStem


  • public interface PersonalStem
    Pluggable interface thats allows site-specific rules for naming Personal stems. To use this feature, the key plugin.personalstem in resources/media.properties must be set to the name of a Class which implements this interface

    Version:
    $Id: PersonalStem.java,v 1.4 2007-04-11 08:19:24 isgwb Exp $
